means: 吉纳紫檀（产于北非、印度和锡兰等地），（欧洲的）电影院(kinematograph的缩写)

word_mean: 奇诺：南亚豆科植物囊状紫檀(Pterocarprs marsupium)及其他多种树木的干燥液汁，因富含奇诺鞣酸(kinotannic acid)曾用作收敛剂

sentence.Network_en: Kino, a poor fisherman, found a very large pearl.
sentence.Network_cn: 吉诺是个穷苦的渔夫.他捞到一颗硕大的珍珠.

sentence.Network_en: The music of the pearl was shrilling with triumph in Kino.
sentence.Network_cn: 珍珠之歌在基诺心里奏出胜利的旋律.

sentence.Network_en: Kino had wondered often at the iron in his patient, fragile wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他这个耐心, 纤弱的妻子竟会有钢铁般的意志,这常使基诺感到惊奇.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 旅行者奇诺（Kino）骑着她那会说话的摩托车汉密斯（Hermes）到各个国家旅行，在每个国家奇诺都只停留三天，在她体会了该国家 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: apparently from a West African language

means.word_mean: 1. obtained from various tropical plants; used as an astringent and in tanning
